title: "They Love Tech. They’ve Got Money. Why Does Silicon Valley Ignore Old People?"
excerpt: "What can Silicon Valley do for older people? One place to look is in health care, where — lured by the vast riches of Medicare Advantage, a program that offers seniors a way to buy private medical insurance paid for in part by Medicare — venture capitalists and entrepreneurs have begun to recognize the market opportunity in aging."
